entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
